page.title: 09School Sports Day
page.content: At Braybrooke County Primary School we have 2 sports days.We have one of our own and a big one in which 4 schools take part.This is my first sports day in this school. Before our own sports day the weather was terrible and I had a funny feeling it was going to rain on the day. When the day arrived it was a little windy in the morning but very warm in the afternoon so we were lucky. I think the infants 3-legged races are the funniest because when one of the pairs are in the lead they just fall over so if someone else is lucky they win. On the 3rd July 1985 3 more schools came to join us.The schools were Loddington, Maidwell and Rushton. We were'nt doing very well at the start but in the end we won. It was a very enjoyable day.
